charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found a golf ball 
at the base of a tree.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1101_0200:
After picking it up, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed that 
there was a name written on it...
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0400:
You went out of your way to return this to me?
Thank you.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0500:
There aren’t any places I can practice
a full game of golf on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0600:
But I go to the forest so that 
I can at least practice my swing.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0700:
Toucannon often goes out with a golf ball
in his mouth, so I guess we lost this one
when we were in the forest last time.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0800:
I practice my swing six hours every day.
It has become a fundamental routine for me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1000:
Yes, of course! I train with my Pokémon
as much as I practice golf.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_1100: Wow, you must be really busy.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_1200:
I suppose I am pretty busy, but training 
my Pokémon is always a priority.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_1300:
I have to juggle both since 
I promised myself that I would.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1500:
I make sure to go to sleep 
at the same time every day.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1600:
No matter what, I always take care of my body
so I can keep up with my training regimen.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_1700: Don’t wear yourself out too much.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_1900:
But I make sure that I am in peak physical
condition, so no need to worry.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2000: Besides, I have Toucannon by my side.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2100:
Toucannon’s beak is nice and warm, so I sleep 
very comfortably when I snuggle up to him.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2200:
It’s so cozy next to his beak, 
and touching it helps me fall asleep.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2300: See? If you get close like this...
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2400:
Hmmm...
He doesn’t seem to be in a mood to humor me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2500: Is this because of what happened yesterday?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_2700:
Well, yesterday a Trainer asked us to battle 
with them after our daily golf practice.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_2900:
Well, yesterday a Trainer asked us to battle 
with them after our daily golf practice.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3000:
There were many onlookers who wanted to
challenge me, one after another.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3100:
In the end, we had 20 Pokémon 
battles back-to-back.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3200:
We were exhausted by the end of the day,
and I just collapsed next to Toucannon.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3300:
I meant to snuggle close to his beak, 
but I ended up sticking my head into it 
and falling asleep there.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3400:
Toucannon stayed in that awkward position 
all night and waited for me to wake up.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3500:
I’m sure the poor thing was trying 
hard not to wake me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3600:
By morning, his beak was trembling 
from the strain.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3700: Do you think my head was heavy?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3800:
Ow, ow! Toucannon! Stop! Stop pecking!
Your beak is so hot!
What does this rhythm mean... Are you angry?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3900:
My Toucannon is usually shy, but he becomes
very stern when he’s angry.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4000:
I guess this is just him showing how much he
cares. I’m sorry, Toucannon. I’ll make sure to
not let myself doze off like that again.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0301_4100: How can you work so hard like that?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_4200: I suppose it’s because it’s something I enjoy.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_4300: Don’t you ever just take a break?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_4400:
That’s a good question...
That thought hasn’t really crossed my mind.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4500:
I was fortunate enough to find 
two things that I love.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4600: And those are Toucannon and golf.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4700:
It would be wrong for me to say that
either of those is a burden to me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_4900: You don’t need to worry about that with me!
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_5100: You don’t need to worry about that with me!
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5200:
If I go so far that I might really hurt myself,
Toucannon will be there to peck some sense 
back into me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5300:
He is the perfect partner when it comes to golf,
Pokémon battles, and even everyday life.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5400:
If I overwork myself and collapse, 
it would cause a lot of trouble for Toucannon.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5500:
And that is something I want to avoid 
more than anything.
